locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Dataverse Plugin
Deposit data sets and/or other supplementary files to a Dataverse.
Connect
Dataverse Network URL
URL of Dataverse Network to which the journal's Dataverse belongs
Username of account to be used to deposit files in Dataverse
Password for username given above
Dataverse Network URL is required.
Dataverse Network URL is not valid.
Please enter a valid username for the specified Dataverse Network.
Please enter a valid password for the specified Dataverse Network.
Select Dataverse
Dataverse
Select Dataverse to store this journal's data files.
Please select a Dataverse.
Settings
Data Policies
Configure data policies.
Data Availability Policy
General data availability policy for the journal. This will appear in About the Journal.
Please provide a data availability policy.
Add data policies for specific journal sections.
Data Submission and Citation Guidelines
Add data submission and citation guidelines for authors.
Data Review Guidelines
Add data review guidelines for editors and copyeditors.
Terms of Use
Provide terms of use or choose to fetch terms of use from Dataverse.
Provide the terms of use to which users must agree before depositing data files.
Fetch terms of use from the Dataverse set up for this journal.
Enter custom terms of use in the field below.
Could not retrieve terms of use for the configured Dataverse. Please check connection settings.
Metadata Settings
Citation format
Choose format of publication citation displayed in study cataloguing information.
APA Citation Style
Public identifier type
Choose type of public identifier to link to article from publication citation. If no public identifier plugins are enabled, citations for published articles will use OJS URLs.
Workflow Settings
Require data files
Require submissions to include data files deposited in Dataverse.
Authors are required to deposit submission data files in Dataverse. Upload a supplementary file to continue.
Release draft studies
Editor accepts submission
Article is published
Submission data has been deposited in Dataverse.
Cataloguing information for this submission's Dataverse study has been updated.
An error occurred while updating cataloguing information for this submission's Dataverse study.
An error occurred deleting the submission's Dataverse study.
The file has been added to the submission's Dataverse study.
An error occurred while adding the file to the submission's Dataverse study.
Supplementary file has been removed from the journal's Dataverse.
Submission data has been removed from the journal's Dataverse.
Data published in this journal's Dataverse is not accessible until the Dataverse is released. Please log in to the journal's Dataverse and release it.

Submission data has been published in Dataverse:

{$dataCitation}
An error occured updating this submission's data in Dataverse.
Dataverse Plugin: Publish Data

If this submission is to be published with research data that is already in a repository, please provide a data citation. Research data may also be submitted for publication by uploading supplementary files in step 4 of the submission process.
Data citation
Dataverse Plugin: Publish Data
Research data can be submitted for publication by depositing supplementary files in the journal's Dataverse or by supplying a citation to data already in a repository.
Treat uploaded file as supplementary file. File will not be deposited in Dataverse.
Deposit file in Dataverse. Author accepts and agrees to Dataverse terms of use.
Please upload a file to deposit in Dataverse.
The file will be added to the Dataverse study created for this submission:
External Data Citation
If the data to be published with this submission is already in a different repository, please provide a data citation.
Please upload files to deposit in Dataverse OR provide an external data citation.
